UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity, bactericidal mechanism and LPS-neutralizing activity of the cell-penetrating peptide pVEC and its analogs.
Literature.Author: Nan YH, Park IS, Hahm KS, Shin SY

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli KCTC 1682(MIC=8µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 1637(MIC=8µM),Salmonella typhimurium KCTC 1926(MIC=4µM),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 3068(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis KCTC 1917(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MIC=4µM)
